sentence.Network_en: Some things are not perceivable by sense, but only cogitable by reason.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些事物不能以感官觉察, 只能由推理而得知.

sentence.Network_en: The principle of the method is simple, more perceivable and of high accuracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 此种方法原理简单, 直观性强,精确度较高.

sentence.Network_en: In your terms some civilizations are real and perceivable, and some are not.
sentence.Network_cn: 用你们的话来说,一些文明是真实的和可感知的, 而另一些则不是.
